text: Gjon Zef Ndoja (born 18 May 1991 in Shkoder) is an Albanian professional basketball player who currently plays for BC Vllaznia in the Albanian Basketball League.Balkan League profileEurobasket profile ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Shkodër Category:Power forwards (basketball)
title: Gjon Ndoja
